meanings.definition: A person who resides in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The residers of the town gathered for a community meeting.
meanings.sent2: The residers of the neighborhood take pride in their gardens.
meanings.sent3: The residers of the apartment building had a potluck to get to know each other better.
meanings.sent4: The residers of the forest whispered stories to the wind.
meanings.sent5: The residers of the village painted their houses in bright colors.

meanings.definition: The act of residing or living in a place.
meanings.sent1: The peaceful residers of the countryside enjoy the quiet life.
meanings.sent2: The legal document confirmed the residers of the property.
meanings.sent3: The residers of the hotel complained about the noisy guests next door.
meanings.sent4: The residers of the city streets hummed with activity at all hours.
meanings.sent5: The residers of the beach basked in the warm sun.
